name: Rusalka week
description:
“I still do not understand why I went there! After all, the ghost from the Secretblood family cemetery and the rusalkas themselves warned me! .. And me? What I've done? I was just wondering where these four disappear every spring. Damn my curiosity!

It was not difficult to track down their shelter: it was as if they did not try to be invisible. There, I realized that every spring, Rusalkas, losing control of themselves, turn into embittered monsters that attack everyone who meets in their path ... "

Technical information:

Game installation: Unzip the RusalkaWeek.rar archive.

Interface languages: Russian / English (beta).

Control: 

WASD or  ▲◄▼► -  moving

Spacebar - Jump

Left mouse button - hit

esc - menu
